Sweepa

About

  • Sweepa is a robot vacuum that uses algorithms X and Y to clean your floor and improve its path. You can draw your room's layout, place Sweepa anywhere in the room and watch it clean with different settings.

Help

  • Click and drag on the grid to place down walls.
  • Click the Sweepa button and place Sweepa down by clicking on the grid.
  • Choose a cleaning mode and press Start to watch Sweepa clean your room!

Modes

  • Okay
  • Smart
  • Smarter
